heading: Build experiences using Actionflows on events (Title)
title: Connect to any data source
descriptions: Add-on empowers both developers and non-developers to effortlessly create custom automation solutions. Whether it's handling cron jobs, executing ETL tasks, setting up custom alerts, or automating processes like data retrieval and automatic response emails, this platform offers a comprehensive range of capabilities.

Workflows can be triggered on a recurring schedule or based on specific event-based triggers, providing a fast and efficient way for developers to design custom automation (Link) recipes tailored to their unique requirements.

cards.title: Added
descriptions: Ex editor id now replaced with JSEditor for action parameters and connectors in actionflow.
points: On the air updates for Controls and Functions

cards.title: Fixed
points: Minor fixes in app git sync
Add user with SSO user login fixed.

heading: SurrealDB: IP Whitelisting, Audit Logging, and App Performance Optimization
title: Enhancement and Additions to platform
descriptions: Enhance your system's security and accessibility by whitelisting IPs and ensuring their reachability seamlessly.
Dive into comprehensive audit logs that trace every event, providing insights into database activities and ensuring compliance with ease.
Experience lightning-fast load times with optimized caching algorithms, reducing network stress and backend API load for improved app performance.
